title: Master of Science in AI and Data Science
description: A comprehensive graduate program that combines artificial intelligence, machine learning, and data science with medical applications. Students gain hands-on experience with real-world healthcare data and cutting-edge AI technologies.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in computer science, mathematics, statistics, or related field
Programming experience in Python or R

courses.title: Foundations of AI and Data Science
courses.description: Introduction to artificial intelligence and data science concepts, including machine learning algorithms, statistical methods, and data preprocessing techniques.

courses.title: Machine Learning for Healthcare
courses.description: Application of machine learning techniques to healthcare problems, including medical image analysis, electronic health records, and predictive modeling.

courses.title: Deep Learning and Neural Networks
courses.description: Advanced study of deep learning architectures, including convolutional neural networks, recurrent neural networks, and transformer models.

courses.title: Medical Data Analytics
courses.description: Analysis of medical data including genomics, proteomics, and clinical data. Focus on statistical methods and visualization techniques.

title: Certificate in Clinical AI Applications
description: A professional certificate program designed for healthcare professionals who want to integrate AI technologies into clinical practice. Learn practical applications of AI in diagnosis, treatment planning, and patient care.
requirements: Healthcare professional license or medical degree

courses.title: Introduction to AI in Healthcare
courses.description: Overview of artificial intelligence applications in healthcare, including current technologies and future trends.

courses.title: AI-Powered Diagnostic Tools
courses.description: Hands-on experience with AI diagnostic tools, including medical imaging analysis and decision support systems.

title: PhD in Biomedical AI
description: A research-intensive doctoral program focusing on the development and application of AI technologies in biomedical research. Students work closely with faculty on cutting-edge research projects.

courses.title: Advanced AI Methods in Biomedicine
courses.description: Advanced artificial intelligence methods specifically designed for biomedical applications, including novel architectures and optimization techniques.

title: Data Literacy for Healthcare Professionals
description: A continuing education course designed to help healthcare professionals understand and interpret data in their daily practice. Covers basic statistics, data visualization, and evidence-based decision making.

courses.title: Healthcare Data Fundamentals
courses.description: Introduction to healthcare data types, sources, and basic analysis techniques.
